Articles.Content:
> 
> Says this while creating a new page XD

True, but I think he read his own post.

Edit: I like how I created a new page with this post too.

> 
> What was the bug?

It's described in [this thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116650-Scott-Manley-s-1-0-Rocket-Powered-Surfboard-%28Airboard-%29).

Happy landings!
that one might be tricky to squash. It depends on how the occulsion is calculated. It could need a partial rewrite of the code, in which case I would guess next patch after the release.

> 
> [https://31.media.tumblr.com/9511ee25aa757b45b5a80f73b5f05fe1/tumblr_inline_mup7bxFloa1qfcrse.jpg](https://31.media.tumblr.com/9511ee25aa757b45b5a80f73b5f05fe1/tumblr_inline_mup7bxFloa1qfcrse.jpg)

YOUR USERNAME! How was it not taken!? ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

Frankly, i'd rather take some tiny aero dynamics bug which is probably solved on reload anyway over delaying the release. Who would deny some early access to the 1.0 beta if he could get it now? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Were so hyped up, Chuck Norris just got on board! OMG SOO MUCH MYPE!!!

> 
> 0.24 was historic. We're never going to beat that level, people were hyping just for the sake of hyping!

And we are in a totally different situation right now.

If the posts that are related to post count were removed from this thread it'd be about 10 pages long and the last post would have been a week ago.

> 
> frankly, i'd rather take some tiny aero dynamics bug which is probably solved on reload anymore about delaying the release.

I'd rather have a complete game and wait another week.

> 
> I'd rather have a complete game and wait another week.

Your decision. Just wait for 1.01 if you want more fixes. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> I'd rather have a complete game and wait another week.

I think you are in the minority there, especially on the Hype Train.
![be8k4dX.png](http://i.imgur.com/be8k4dX.png)

> 
> that one might be tricky to squash. It depends on how the occlusion is calculated. It could need a partial rewrite of the code, in which case I would guess next patch after the release.

Fortunately release will not be delayed for it. Should see danny put out some nice videos of it though.
Forum got some heart flutter.
I got a Bad Gateway nginx/1.8.0.

> 
> Were so hyped up, Chuck Norris just got on board! OMG SOO MUCH MYPE!!!

![HYEV7Tf.gif](http://i.imgur.com/HYEV7Tf.gif)

Hype train now causing 502 gateway errors!

Dis jus' got serious....

> 
> YOUR USERNAME! How was it not taken!? ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

Bequase i have it taken:cool:

So, seeing the new temperature system at work today, I am expecting that Eve landers will roast after a while in the intense heat, Moho's day side just the same. That will put a damper on peoples visions of mining Eve for the return trip.

> 
> Were so hyped up, Chuck Norris just got on board! OMG SOO MUCH MYPE!!!

We need Clint.
Sadly my earlyer prediction of 187 hype pages before 6 didn't hold true.![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
It's 00:02, where is it

> 
> Sadly my earlyer prediction of 187 hype pages before 6 didn't hold true.![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

It's only 5PM Squad time.

> 
> Sadly my earlyer prediction of 187 hype pages before 6 didn't hold true.![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Well, it's not six where other people are. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
We are now at Plaid Factor 5! This has previously been thought to be impossible to reach!
Ok, a quick tally! How many pages have we jumped so far today?
